channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.title: Report X-2025021104
item.description:
Report X-2025021104

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: DECALRED HAZMAT ANNOUNCED TO RESPONDER AS LEAKING, IDENTIFIED LEAKING PACKAGE AS ACETONE BY SHIPPING PAPERS AND BROUGHT BACK TO DMP AND FOLLOWED APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET

item.title: Report X-2025021051
item.description:
Report X-2025021051

  • City: MONTGOMERY
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONED TO PACKAGE WEARING PROPER PPE AND DESICION TREE IN HAND. PACKAGE LEAKING ON BED OF TRAILER. USING DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET CONTAINED LEAKER AND TRANPORTED TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report E-2025020334
item.description:
Report E-2025020334

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-26T06:20:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-29
  • City: MADISON
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Circle K
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 20-gallons of gasoline was released due to mechanical failure during delivery. AMPOL deployed oil dri and completely cleaned the impacted asphalt parking lot. The impacted oil dri and recovered gasoline was containerized into two, 55-gallon metal drums for disposal.
